member.name: IDWriteFont3.CreateFontFace
member.summary: Creates a font face object for the font.
member.param: A pointer to a memory block that receives a pointer to a interface for the newly created font face object.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.
This method returns DWRITE_E_REMOTEFONT if it could not construct a remote font.

member.name: IDWriteFont3.Equals
member.summary: Compares two instances of font references for equality.
member.param: A pointer to a interface for the other font instance to compare to this font instance.
member.returns: Returns whether the two instances of font references are equal. Returns TRUE if the two instances are equal; otherwise, FALSE.

member.name: IDWriteFont3.GetFontFaceReference
member.summary: Gets a font face reference that identifies this font.
member.param: A pointer to a memory block that receives a pointer to a interface for the newly created font face reference object.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IDWriteFont3.GetLocality
member.summary: Gets the current locality of the font.
member.returns: Returns the current locality of the font.

member.name: IDWriteFont3
member.summary: Represents a font in a font collection.
